title: Britain at War
itunes:title: Britain at War
itunes:subtitle: On the 75th anniversary of VE Day we speak to Dan Todman about Britain’s role in defeating the Nazis and the challenges of the postwar years. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
On the 75th anniversary of VE Day we speak to historian Dan Todman, author of Britain's War: A New World, 1942–1947, about Britain’s role in defeating the Nazis and the challenges of adjusting to the postwar years. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
